pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/bioblend.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/bioblend/ :alt: latest version available on PyPI.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/bioblend/badge/ :alt: Documentation Status :target: https://bioblend.readthedocs.io/.. image:: https://badges.gitter.im/galaxyproject/bioblend.svg :alt: Join the chat at https://gitter.im/galaxyproject/bioblend :target: https://gitter.im/galaxyproject/bioblend?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badgeBioBlend is a Python library for interacting with the `Galaxy`_ API.BioBlend is supported and tested on:- Python 3.7 - 3.11- Galaxy release 17.09 and later.Full docs are available at https://bioblend.readthedocs.io/ with a quick libraryoverview also available in `ABOUT.rst <./ABOUT.rst>`_... References/hyperlinks used above.. _Galaxy: https://galaxyproject.org/
